ComicInfo.Penciller: Fred Carrillo,Gerry Talaoc,Lee Elias,Nick Cardy,Ruben Yandoc,Gerry Talaoc,Ruben Yandoc,Fred Carrillo,Lee Elias
ComicInfo.Summary:
Just What Did Eric See?: Eric accidentally hits a swimmer with his boat, so he takes her home to nurse her back to health.
A Change for the Hearse: Gus poses as a dying millionaire's lost son, hoping to collect the inheritance.
The Coffin Came on Time: A mysterious man accompanies a coffin on a train journey.
A Madman's Loose Among Us: When Carlotta and Quentin find a young man hiding in their house they make him their servant.
ComicInfo.Title: Just What Did Eric See?; A Change for the Hearse; The Coffin Came on Time; A Madman's Loose Among Us
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
